title: Enhancing Nursing Practice Competencies: Language-Based Cultural Education for Traditional Cake Preservation

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic culinary terminology and general interest in cultural preservation
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Ability to explain the historical background and cultural significance of traditional cakes using three or more keywords
Ability to describe the manufacturing process of Moko/Miku cakes in five or more descriptive sequential stages
Ability to present educational strategies for preserving traditional foods linked to language learning (vocabulary/expressions)
Ability to acquire and utilize 20+ culinary terms with multicultural elements in descriptive writing

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
